column1: CA/Writ/57/2021  and  CA/Writ/61/2021 of  this  Court,  mentioned  above,  should  be

column2: The facts of the case bearing No. CA/Writ/57/2021 show that the Chairman of
the Pradeshiya Sabha has not assented to the amendments proposed to the budget
and incorporated same to the proposed budget.

The 
facts  of 
the  case  bearing  No.  CA/Writ/61/2021 
show 
that  although
amendments were proposed to the budget they were not presented to the Council.
There were no amendments proposed in the instant application.
